sentences.english: The farmland great body didn't move and just seeing at Helen chillily.
sentences.chinese: 田宏的身體沒有動，只是冷冷的看着海倫。

sentences.english: RenShun crying to be good English explanation, but good English coldly leave.
sentences.chinese: 仁順哭着向善英解釋，但是善英冷冷地離去。

sentences.english: his face got red. Mr. Carr kept looking at Alfred coldly.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾先生冷冷地直盯着艾爾弗雷德。

sentences.english: The widow of the waterfront gave Mormont a cool look.
sentences.chinese: 水前的寡婦給了莫爾蒙一個冷冷的眼神。

sentences.english: We should be warm towards our comrades, not ice cold and indifferent.
sentences.chinese: 看待同志要滿腔熱忱，不能冷冷清清，漠不關心。

sentences.english: If promotion was not done good, that may be cold and cheerless, of unmanned make inquires.
sentences.chinese: 如果推廣沒做好，那可能是冷冷清清，無人問津的。

sentences.english: He smiled coldly at the angel.
The cool voice resounds in the auditorium, Zhang Kai's eye pupil is a burst of to enlarge later on.
sentences.chinese: 冷冷的聲音在大廳迴盪，隨後張凱的瞳孔一陣放大。

sentences.english: But Mr Micawber did not move. He stared coldly at his employer.
sentences.chinese: 可米考伯先生沒走，他冷冷地盯着他的僱主。

sentences.english: 'From punching people in the face,' he replied, deadpan.
sentences.chinese: 他冷冷的告訴我，也是在打別人臉的時候。

sentences.english: “We have a ventilation problem, ” Rimney says stiffly.
sentences.chinese: “我們這兒只不過是通風有問題，”裏穆尼冷冷地說。

sentences.english: "I think you misunderstood me,"he said drily.
sentences.chinese: “我想起你誤解了我，”他冷冷地說。
他冷冷地拒絕了她的請求。

sentences.english: Landy cooly tells Vosen: "Better get a good lawyer."
sentences.chinese: 蘭蒂冷冷的告訴他“你最好找個好律師”。

sentences.english: He turned from the window to regard her with a cold stare.
sentences.chinese: 他從窗邊扭過身來，冷冷的注視着她。

definition: to sneer/to laugh grimly/grin of dissatisfaction (bitterness, helplessness, indignation etc)/bitter, grim, sarcastic or angry smile
like a smile yet not a smile (idiom)
to shoot a glance/glance/to appear in a flash
to disdain to do sth/to think sth not worth doing/to feel it beneath one's dignity
to cast sidelong glances at sb
to glower (at sb)/to cast an angry look
